posts.post_content:
Two slabs are offered for your viewing pleasure and hopefully for you purchase as well.  No run of the mill backs here either.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10285/oleary-hands-on-knees[/IMG]

Charley O'Leary Hands on Knees pose in an SGC 30 holder with an SC Fact 42 overstrike back for $38 shipped ($40 for reg PP)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10341/burchell-epdg[/IMG]

Fred Burchell in VG, PSA 3, condition with an EPDG back for $175 shipped
($180 for regular PP)

All payments include shipping.  I will accept checks and money orders as well as no fee PP options.  Regular PP includes the surcharge as noted.

Thanks for looking.  If you're undecided, keep looking.

HI:
Can I take MR. Powers off your hands??

I'll take him well preserved and all!

email is [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
Slabba Dabba Done on Mr. Powers.
Prices slashed for the weekend.  If they do not sell, they will be returned to a secure undisclosed location.
